Making Stuff with
Motivation Science

Steven M. Ledbetter, aka "Stevo" or "Coach Stevo" is an expert in the science of human behavior change. He has built sucessful companies, products, and services that have helped thousands of people change their lives.

Stuff Stevo has made

Habitry

A consulting company using Practical Motivation Science to help people make more effective products and content.

Habitry iOS

An iOS app to help coaches keep groups of clients feeling motivated and on track to their goals.

the bettercast

A podcast featuring real stories about people getting better at things and the unexpected impact these adventures had on their lives.

betterish

A personal project to explore what "getting better" at stuff means.

The Motivate Summits

The only open Unconferences in health and fitness and the only summits designed to bring health coaches together to collaborate on what works.

We Make Communities

A book for coaches who want to help the most people they can using the best in practical Motivation Science.

  • How to Design Motivating Push NotificationsWhy some push notifications make people quit apps, why others work, and 8 useful guidelines for improving your push notifications.

  • Motivating HumansAn Introduction to Self-Determination Theory and its Practical Applications.

  • The Nagging Issues of NudgingA Nobel Prize doesn’t answer the hard questions we’re all avoiding about nudging.

  • We're All Motivation DesignersWe clearly need motivating technology. Now we just need people to design it.

  • AI is cool, but how do I scale health coaching now?Health and fitness coaching will soon be handled by artificial intelligence, but how does health coaching scale now?

  • How Artificial Intelligence Will Scale Health CoachingMost health coaching will be handled by artificial intelligence in the next five years. Here's how we think it will go down.
